questions.question: 1. What is the purpose of flow cytometry?

answers.a: To analyze the physical and chemical properties of cells and particles in a fluid sample
answers.c: To visualize cells and tissues at the microscopic level
answers.d: To measure the mass of cells and particles in a sample

questions.question: 2. What is the purpose of sheath fluid?

answers.b: To position the sample of cells into a single file for optical interrogation
answers.c: To increase the speed of the flow
answers.d: To increase volume of the cellular mixture

explanations.b: $\\$ $\\$

questions.question: 3. Which of the following is not a component of a flow cytometer?
4. What is forward scatter in flow cytometry?

answers.a: The measurement of light scattered at an angle to the laser beam
answers.b: The measurement of light emitted by fluorescent molecules in the sample
answers.c: The measurement of light scattered in the same direction as the laser beam
answers.d: The measurement of light transmitted through the sample

questions.question: 5. Which of the following is not typically measured in flow cytometry?
6. What is fluorescence in flow cytometry?

answers.a: The measurement of light scattered at an angle to the laser beam
answers.b: The measurement of light emitted by fluorescent molecules in the sample
answers.c: The measurement of light scattered in the same direction as the laser beam
answers.d: The measurement of light transmitted through the sample

questions.question: 7. Which characteristic of a cell is proportional to forward-scattered light (FSC) in flow cytometry?
8. What does side-scattered light (SSC) in flow cytometry indicate about a cell?
9. Which type of light measurement is used to differentiate cell types in a heterogeneous cell population?

answers.c: Both forward-scattered light (FSC) and side-scattered light (SSC)

questions.question: 10. Which of the following is NOT a component of a flow cytometer?
11. What is the main function of the optical system in a flow cytometer?

answers.a: To channel cells into a single file
answers.b: To focus the laser beam and detect scattered light
answers.c: To convert light signals into electronic signals
answers.d: To analyze the data and generate reports
